404.title: Page Not Found
404.subtitle: The page you're looking for doesn't exist
404.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Let's get you back on track!

500.title: Server Error
500.subtitle: Something went wrong on our end
500.description: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later or contact us if the problem persists.

network.title: Connection Error
network.subtitle: Unable to connect to the server
network.description: Please check your internet connection and try again.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.phone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.maxLength: Must be no more than {max} characters

submit.error: Failed to submit form. Please try again.

loading.title: Loading...
loading.description: Please wait while we load the content
loading.timeout: Loading is taking longer than expected

permission.title: Access Denied
permission.subtitle: You don't have permission to access this page
permission.description: You don't have the necessary permissions to view this content.

maintenance.title: Under Maintenance
maintenance.subtitle: We're currently updating our website
maintenance.description: We're performing scheduled maintenance to improve your experience. Please check back soon.

generic.title: Oops! Something went wrong
generic.subtitle: An unexpected error occurred
generic.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again or contact us if the problem persists.

file.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size: {maxSize}

api.rateLimit: Too many requests. Please wait before trying again.

browser.update: Please update your browser to the latest version
browser.javascript: JavaScript is required for this application
browser.cookies: Cookies are required for this application

accessibility.keyboard: Use Tab to navigate, Enter to select, Escape to close
